scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:optimism: mustache config/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:kovan:linus: npm run prepare:kovan && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ 0xlinus/aelin-kovan
scripts.deploy:optimism:linus: npm run prepare:optimism && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ 0xlinus/aelin-optimism
scripts.deploy:mainnet:linus: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ 0xlinus/aelin-mainnet
scripts.deploy:all:linus: npm run deploy:kovan:linus && npm run deploy:mainnet:linus && npm run deploy:optimism:linus
